text: A book lays on the table on the outer corner of the room.
It's filled with sermons you recognize from when you were little.
You continue flipping through the pages.
Further in the back there is a list of names, many of which sound familiar to you.
Fond memories of your past play before your minds eye.

name: You
text: They've all already went on their journeys... and now I can finally join them.
